definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: About a month after her arrival, she taught me the word "water".
sentences.chinese: 她来后约莫一个月，就教我认得了“水”这个词。

sentences.english: She was around 20 and only had one arm.
sentences.chinese: 她约莫20岁，只有一边手臂。

sentences.english: They are best imagined as roughly the size of your hand.
sentences.chinese: 它们的巨细最佳想象成约莫与你的手同样大。

sentences.english: It was about an hour later that the geese woke up. They had devastating hangovers.
sentences.chinese: 约莫一个钟头以后这些鹅醒了，宿醉得要死不活。

sentences.english: Will you excuse me for awhile?It is about 5minutes.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我要权时离开一下，约莫是5分钟时间。

sentences.english: When we await until approximately evening, Ji nine come behind.
sentences.chinese: 我们等到约莫黄昏之时，纪九回来了。

sentences.english: It was around a week after moving day.
The bottle had been about three-quarters full then.
sentences.chinese: 那时瓶子里约莫四分之三满。

sentences.english: The packing production line length probably has 40 meters.
sentences.chinese: 包拆消费线的少度约莫有40米。

sentences.english: Ankle sprains accounted for about half of all injuries.
sentences.chinese: 踝中心环节关头扭伤约莫占所有受伤环境的一半。

definition: a portion smaller than a half/the lesser part/the smaller part
a (10 meter) square/a square of given side
more than ten/a dozen or more
period of time (may be months, or mere seconds)/spare time/skill/labor/effort
measure of length, ten Chinese feet (3.3 m)/to measure/husband/polite appellation for an older male
